subtitle: Use king prawns if you have them in this oh-so-easy starter.

method.text: In a small bowl, mix together the mayonnaise, tomato puree, lemon juice, Worcestershire sauce and seasoning. Set aside.
Toss the prawns, half the lettuce, tomatoes, celery and cucumber together. Divide the remaining lettuce between individual serving glasses or dishes. Top with the prawn mixture. Chill for 30 min.
Spoon the sauce over the prawns.

title: Prawn cocktail
